name: Immersive Sexiles Extensions
description:
This mod adds custom content to the server Immersive Exiles. Featuring a non-limited economy driven by exclusive items and features working as gold sinks. You'll find new customized weapons, additional recipes for religions, new placeables and Tavern vendors to power your roleplay hubs.

Our vendors and objects can get mischievous: with slave cuffs and collar that actually restrict movement, a blindfold, and a strap on to represent thrall mechanics with players or spice it up in your castle's dungeon

- Special thanks for Jostech who not jsut helped me each time I stuck but gave the basics of the barber system 

server addres:  [[RP]IMMERSIVE SEXILES[+18]   [185.85.84.173:7777]
changeNote:
1.5.3
- Added knockout effect against players for truncheons* 
- New poison crafted by T2/3/4 alchemists: Silent Dream - puts the victim player into an unconscious state for 1min*
- Increased Elevator speed
- Fixed the dye menu for the female Star Metal Tassets
- AGI quest text fix
- Sanctuary banners
- 4 new quest objects

*effectiveness depends on the victim's remaining health percentage and  survival attribute
author: Shendelzare
